description: (Sweat) Suit up in the stylish, everyday comfort of the Marmot Peaks Jogger. You'll be rocking these midweight fleece sweatpants all day while working from home, or throwing them on the second you get back from your work commute. Lounge-worthy softness you can take on the go, these joggers will keep your legs toasty on the short walk from tent to campfire or car to coffee shop. When you're packing for a trip, these soft bottoms will always make the cut so you can bring the coziness of home wherever you're winding down, inside or out.
name: Marmot Peaks Joggers - Mens
